title: I was playing a normal game with a friend and the game never loaded
body:
i pick my champ and we were all set to go but when we were in the charging page I never loaded after 2 minutes it said "failed to reconnect" once I pressed    reconnect it send me to the main client were you put name and password after 30 seconds (while I was putting my password) it automatically reconnect me to the game, after a few seconds it said "the game is no longer running but fell free to start a new game", I said ok but after that when I started a new one I had a leave buster. 
Please help Me!!

replies.body: You shouldn't get a leaverbuster if the game never loaded, so the other game should not have resulted in that.  The failed to connect error, though, can happen if your connection is having problems reaching the game server.  You can have issues like this even if your internet is great, so I suggest going over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot and get in game.  I hope that helps!
Well i got a leave buster i never loaded but the game did so it was a problem on the client, not mine.
By the way its my second game after patch
